Posts.Content: Hi Lisa No I dont think that feeling does ever go away, all we can do is stay positive, as my dr told me the other day "your body will never be the same as it was so dont expect too much of it, you will feel aches you just have to accept them" he did smile though and so did I. Its a very tough thing to get our heads around and we can only have goals and look forward which I try to do each day Thanks for your reply x
Posts.Title: Hi all

Posts.Content: Hi all on this forum.....I am new here and would like to say what a great supportive site, I had breast cancer in 2004 and had surgery for a full mastectomy and chemo I then took tamoxifen for 4 years was nearly out of remission but sadly last year it came back, same side a cell had escaped so I had surgery once again and a course of radiotherapy, I am now on Arimidex for another 5 years.
Posts.Title: Hi all
